message.body: You know what time we are going out tomorrow?
The thing starts at 6:30 so I'd say get there earlier than that.
Boss isn't going to be happy about that lol
Come when you can. I think Steven said he's going to be late. Like he won't be there until 7 something.
Okay. Will probably show up with him then
Good plan.
Would picking me up be out of the way for u
Are you still planning to go later with Steven?
I didn't go to work so could go whenever but then I thought of that I still need to go to bank so I might as well
So you're home right?
Yeah
Oh okay, sure. I'll pick you up. Can you send be your address.
Well I'm planning to park on Callowhill and then walk to the place so I might be there around 5:45-6?
Damn mind stopping by the hospital lol
I might pick some other people up around where you live first so would you be able to make it back in time?
If not ill just show up with Steve. I'm fine either way
So my friend might need more time. So I might get there around 6-6:15.
Would that work better?
I just go with Steve. Can't go without getting money out and don't have card so can't use atm
Nvm you can get me. There is a bank near the institue
